name: LymeDiseaseTestsForBorreliaAfzeliigariniiNucleicAcid
title: Lyme Disease (Tests for Borrelia afzelii/garinii Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia afzelii/garinii Nucleic Acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC: Borrelia afzelii/garinii non-probe/probe; 

LOINC search: Borrelia (afzelii OR garinii) nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
